categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Vorgrim was a male Human of the Sith Empire living during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY he served as a Prison Warden in Shadow Town on Nar Shaddaa where he was killed by a Republic agent seeking to free Phalanx.
Prison Warden Vorgrim appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the heroic mission "Shadow Extraction" on Nar Shaddaa.
